mapper.insert: replace into `face`.`face_regist_info`(id, peo_id, peo_name, status, peo_type, peo_des, bucket_name, file_name, `type`, feature, del_flag) values(#{id}, #{peoId}, #{peoName}, #{status}, #{peoType}, #{peoDes}, #{bucketName}, #{fileName}, #{type}, #{feature}, #{delFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT sec_label as label, sec_label_code as code FROM face.person_label_info;
